text:
e="preserve">Simon Charles Pendered MacCorkindale (12 February 1952 – 14 October 2010) was a British actor, movie director, screenwriter, composer and producer. He was born in Ely, Cambridgeshire. He was known for his roles in "Manimal" as the lead character, "Dr. Jonathan Chase". He also acted for the longer-running role of lawyer Greg Reardon in "Falcon Crest".
MacCorkindale died of colorectal cancer on 14 October 2010 in London at the age of 58.
